\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* fight \w against|strong="H2734"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* strive \w against|strong="H2734"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* thee.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, thou worm \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w you|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* dead \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
